Is anyone else getting a load of audio clipping on louder parts of the movie? I'm finding the audio is fairly poor overall, but in fight scenes, it's just constant distortion, and some of it is out of sync in those fight scenes.

I've not had this problem with HDScene releases in the past, but this one has issues for me.

Ahh. I should pay more attention - this is an R5. That explains the audio issues. I'll wait for a real BluRay version before watching this one further. The audio on the R5 is too annoying to enjoy for me. :)

Yes, the audio is horrible.  Picture not too bad for the file size though.

But the audio is bad enough to detract from the enjoyment of the movie.
